German[edit]

Wochentag

Etymology[edit]

Compound word from Woche (“week”) +‎ Tag (“day”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈvɔχn̩ˌtaːk/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Wo‧chen‧tag

Noun[edit]

Wochentag m

  1. weekday (any day of the week)
  2. weekday (any day of the week except Sunday)
Declension[edit]
Declension of Wochentag
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderWochentagdieWochentage
genitiveeinesdesWochentages,
Wochentags		derWochentage
dativeeinemdemWochentag,

accusativeeinendenWochentagdieWochentage
1Now uncommon, see notes
